name: oppgtset
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cts, c2), cfv(cts, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(TopSet ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(TopSet ` c2)
⊣ (TopSet ` c2)=(TopSet ` c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cts, c2), cfv(cts, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(TopSet ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(TopSet ` c2)
⊣ (TopSet ` c2)=(TopSet ` c1)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cts, c2), cfv(cts, c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(coppg, c2))
-| wceq(cts, cslot(nat9))
-| wcel(nat9, cn)
-| wne(nat9, nat2)
body.pretty:
⊢ (TopSet ` c2)=(TopSet ` c1)
⊣ c1 =(oppG ` c2)
⊣ TopSet = Slot(9)
⊣ 9 ∈ ℕ
⊣ 9 ≠ 2

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(coppg, c2))
-| wceq(cts, cslot(nat9))
-| wcel(nat9, cn)
-| wne(nat9, nat2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(TopSet ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(TopSet ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(oppG ` c2)
⊣ TopSet = Slot(9)
⊣ 9 ∈ ℕ
⊣ 9 ≠ 2

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(coppg, c2))
-| wcel(nat9, cn)
-| wne(nat9, nat2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(TopSet ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(TopSet ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(oppG ` c2)
⊣ 9 ∈ ℕ
⊣ 9 ≠ 2

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(coppg, c2))
-| wne(nat9, nat2)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(TopSet ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(TopSet ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(oppG ` c2)
⊣ 9 ≠ 2

body.origin:
|- wne(nat9, nat2)
-| wcel(nat2, cr)
-| wbr(nat2, clt, nat9)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(coppg, c2))
-| wcel(nat2, cr)
-| wbr(nat2, clt, nat9)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(TopSet ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(TopSet ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(oppG ` c2)
⊣ 2 ∈ ℝ
⊣ 2[<]9

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(coppg, c2))
-| wbr(nat2, clt, nat9)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(TopSet ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(TopSet ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(oppG ` c2)
⊣ 2[<]9

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(coppg, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(TopSet ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(TopSet ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(oppG ` c2)

comment: Topology of an opposite group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Sep-2015.)
